name: Pizza
ingredients:
2 ½ cups warm water
2 teaspoons active dry yeast
7 cups all-purpose flour
6 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil
1 ½ teaspoons kosher salt
 1 cup tomatoe sauce
2cups of cheese
2 cups of your choice of vegetables
instructions: 1.Bloom the yeast by sprinkling the sugar and yeast in the warm water. Let sit for 10 minutes, until bubbles form on the surface.

name: Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies
description: No Bake Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup chocolate chips
1 cup natural creamy peanut butter
3 cups rolled oats
instructions:
1.Melt Chocolate
2.Mix peanut butter and chocolate together
3.Stir in oats
Scoop out 2 tbsp dough and form into ball
Place cookies onto parchment paper

name: Grilled Pineapple
instructions:
1.Cut pineaplle into chunks
2.Place chunks on skewer
3.Grill at 350 F for 10 minutes

name: Banana Cream Pie
description: Cream filled pie with fresh bananas, graham cracker crust, and whipped cream topping.
ingredients: 1. 3 ripe bananas 2. 4 egg yolks 3. 2 cups heavy cream 4. 2 cups crumbled graham crackers 5. 1/4 cup melted butter 6. 1 cup whipping cream for topping
instructions: 1. Mix melted butter and graham cracker crumbs in a small bowl. 2. Press mixed graham crackers into the bottom of a pie tin. 3. Boil milk over medium high heat and then lower to a simmer. 4. Whisk egg yolks into hot milk slowly. 5. Slice bananas and line the bottom of the pie tin. 6. Pour egg yolks and milk mixture into pie tin. 7. Refridgerate for 4 hours. 8. Whip heavy whipping cream until stiff. 9. Pipe whipped cream onto pie. 10. Serve chilled.

name: Root Beer Float
ingredients:
1 cup root beer
 1 scoop vanilla ice cream
instructions:
1.Place root beer into glass
2.Add scoop of vanilla ice cream

name: Frozen Honey
instructions:
1.Place honey in desired container
2.Freeze for atleast 10 hours and enjoy

name: Spicy Edamame
ingredients:
1 cup edamae
2 tbsp chili garlic sauce
1/2tbsp sesame oil
instructions:
1.In a small fry pan on medium low heat add the sesame oil
2.Add chile garlic sauce and remove pan from heat
3.Stir in edamame
